AAE.caption: Card Number
AAE.doc: The card number to validate. Best to set it dynamically from an input box.
AAE.name: card_number

AAF.caption: Card number is valid
AAF.doc: Returns true if card number is valid
AAF.name: validity

AAH.caption: Card icon (use in text element)
AAH.doc: Returns a font-awesome string that can be used in a Text element to display the card type logo. Obscure cards without font-awesome logos return a generic card icon.
AAH.name: card_icon
